00023 simsignal_t Buffer::txPkSignal = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00024 simsignal_t Buffer::latencySignal = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00025 
00026 void Buffer::initialize()
00027 {
00028     ev << "Initialize Buffer" << endl;
00029     initializeStatistics();
00030 
00031     //Initialize parameter cache
00032     handleParameterChange(NULL);
00033 }
00034 
00035 void Buffer::initializeStatistics()
00036 {
00037     txPkSignal = registerSignal("txPk");
00038     latencySignal = registerSignal("latency");
00039 }
00040 
00041 void Buffer::recordPacketSent()
00042 {
00043     emit(txPkSignal, 1L);
00044 }

00046 void Buffer::setIsEmpty(bool empty)
00047 {
00048     if (empty)
00049     {
00050         getDisplayString().setTagArg("i", 1, "black");
00051     }
00052     else
00053     {
00054         getDisplayString().setTagArg("i", 1, "");
00055     }
00056 }

00058 void Buffer::addDestinationGate(cGate *destinationGate)
00059 {
00060     destinationGates.push_back(destinationGate);
00061 }

00063 void Buffer::removeDestinationGate(cGate *destinationGate)
00064 {
00065     destinationGates.remove(destinationGate);

00068 void Buffer::addReceiveCallback(Callback *cb, TTEApplicationBase *application)
00069 {
00070     receiveCallbacks[application]=cb;
00071 }
00072 
00073 Callback* Buffer::getReceiveCallback(TTEApplicationBase *application)
00074 {
00075     if(receiveCallbacks.find(application) == receiveCallbacks.end())
00076         return NULL;
00077     return receiveCallbacks[application];
00078 }
00079 
00080 void Buffer::addTransmitCallback(Callback *cb, TTEApplicationBase *application)
00081 {
00082     transmitCallbacks[application]=cb;
00083 }
00084 
00085 Callback* Buffer::getTransmitCallback(TTEApplicationBase *application)
00086 {
00087     if(transmitCallbacks.find(application) == transmitCallbacks.end())
00088         return NULL;
00089     return transmitCallbacks[application];
00090 }
00091 
00092 EtherFrame* Buffer::getFrame(){
00093     return dequeue();
00094 }
00095 
00096 void Buffer::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00097 {
00098     if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00099     {
00100         EtherFrame *frame = check_and_cast<EtherFrame *>(msg);
00101         //Try to correct destination mac
00102         if(frame->getDest().isUnspecified()){
00103             MACAddress mac;
00104             unsigned long maskedMarker= ctMarker & ctMask;
00105             mac.setAddressByte(0, maskedMarker>>24);
00106             mac.setAddressByte(1, maskedMarker>>16);
00107             mac.setAddressByte(2, maskedMarker>>8);
00108             mac.setAddressByte(3, maskedMarker);
00109             mac.setAddressByte(4, ctId>>8);
00110             mac.setAddressByte(5, ctId);
00111             frame->setDest(mac);
00112         }
00113         emit(latencySignal, simTime()-msg->getCreationTime());
00114         enqueue((EtherFrame*) frame);
00115         // Now execute callbacks if there are some
00116         for(std::map<TTEApplicationBase*,Callback*>::const_iterator iter = receiveCallbacks.begin();
00117                 iter != receiveCallbacks.end(); ++iter){
00118             iter->first->executeCallback(iter->second);
00119         }
00120     }
00121 }
00122 
00123 void Buffer::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00124     ctMask = (unsigned long)par("ct_mask").longValue();
00125     ctMarker = (unsigned long)par("ct_marker").longValue();
00126     ctId = (unsigned long)par("ct_id").longValue();
00127 }

00130 {
00131     ev << "Buffer::enqueue not implemented" << endl;
00132     throw;
00133 }

00136 {
